label: Polymeric microspheres (PLGA/PLA)
definition: Biodegradable polymer microspheres forming a depot at injection site to release API over weeks–months.

label: In-situ forming depot (ISFD)
definition: Liquid injectables that solidify in situ (solvent exchange/thermal gelation) to create a controlled-release depot.

label: Multivesicular liposomes
definition: MVL structures enabling extended release (e.g., DepoFoam/BioSeizer).

label: Liposomes / lipid vesicles
definition: Conventional or engineered liposomes supporting sustained release or targeting.

label: Thermo-responsive hydrogel
definition: Sol–gel transition hydrogels (e.g., RTGel) forming depot post-injection.

label: Liquid crystalline depot
definition: Liquid crystal systems (e.g., glycerol monooleate-based) forming long-acting depots.

label: Nanosuspension / nanocrystal
definition: Poorly soluble APIs as nano/micro suspensions enabling slow dissolution and extended exposure.

label: Long-acting emulsion
definition: Oil-in-water or water-in-oil emulsions for prolonged release.

label: Depot-forming prodrug
definition: Prodrug designed to precipitate/form depot locally and release API over time.

label: PASylation
definition: Genetic fusion with Pro/Ala/Ser repeats to increase hydrodynamic radius and half-life.

label: PEGylation
definition: Covalent attachment of polyethylene glycol to increase size, reduce clearance, extend half-life.

label: Fc fusion
definition: Fusion to IgG Fc to leverage FcRn recycling and extend systemic half-life.

label: Albumin binding / Albumin fusion
definition: Albumin fusion or fatty-acid lipidation to bind albumin and extend half-life.

label: XTEN / unstructured polypeptide extension
definition: Fusion to unstructured hydrophilic polypeptides (e.g., XTEN) to extend half-life.

label: Glyco-engineering
definition: Engineering of N-glycans or sialylation to reduce clearance and prolong exposure.

label: Sequence/structure engineering
definition: Amino-acid substitutions or site-specific conjugation to reduce clearance or enhance target engagement.
